(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB How))
    (SQ (VBZ does)
      (NP (DT a) (NNP Hawker))
      (VP (VB achieve)
        (NP (JJ legendary) (NN status))))
    (. ?)))

dobj(achieve-5, status-7)

    (PP (IN Well))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (ADVP (RB firstly))
      (NP (PRP$ your) (NN food))
      (VP (MD must)
        (VP (VB be)
          (ADJP (JJ good)))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (ADVP (RB secondly))
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ helps)
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB when))
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (NP (DT a) (JJ distinguishing) (NN feature)))))))
    (. .)))

              (VP (VBG frying)
                (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))))

              (ADVP (RB also))
              (ADJP (VBN crippled)))))))

      (VP (VBN made)
        (S
          (NP (PRP him))
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (NN legend))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (JJ local) (NNP Hawker) (NN lore)))))))
    (. .)))

                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Opeh) (NNS leaves)))))))))
    (. .)))
